repository.corpname: Oregon Historical Society, Davies Family Research Library

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

physdesc.extent: 250 cubic feet (245 record cartons and 21 volumes)

did.abstract: Collection includes: General field office tariffs: commodities tariffs, company tariffs, tariff bureau tariffs, etc.; Miscellaneous files; Classification books. Burlington Northern Railroad (BN) was created on March 2, 1970, by the merger of four primary railroads: Chicago, Burlington & Quincy Railroad Co. (CB&Q); Northern Pacific Railway Co. (NP); Great Northern Railway Co. (GN); and the Spokane, Portland and Seattle Railway Co. (SP&S).

bioghist.p: Burlington Northern Railroad (BN) was created on March 2, 1970, by the merger of four primary railroads: Chicago, Burlington & Quincy Railroad Co. (CB&Q); Northern Pacific Railway Co. (NP); Great Northern Railway Co. (GN); and the Spokane, Portland and Seattle Railway Co. (SP&S).

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: General field office tariffs: commodities tariffs, company tariffs, tariff bureau tariffs, etc.; Miscellaneous files; Classification books.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is unprocessed. For information contact the Oregon Historical Society Research Library at libreference@ohs.org, or 503-306-5240.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Burlington Northern Railroad Company Records, Mss 1799, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

controlaccess.corpname: Burlington Northern Railroad Company -- Records and correspondence.
